properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 11:40AM EST until February 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS
AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY FOR NORTHERN CENTRAL INDIANA...

.Low pressure is expected to quickly sweep through the Ohio
Valley this afternoon and tonight. Snow is expected to begin
falling this afternoon and continue tonight. Accumulations will
be most likely north of I-70....resulting in slippery roads and
surfaces.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
up to 3 inches.

* WHERE...Vigo and Clay Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday
morning commutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest amounts are likely to be north
of Interstate 70.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Indiana can be obtained by
calling 1 800 2 6 1 7 6 2 3

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THURSDAY
